body_html: @ville-k the segfault might have been from an older version of Xcode, I upgraded to 7.2 trying to track down the other issue and I think it's been fixed... but it should use DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH on osx rather than LD_LIBRARY_PATH right?
body_text: @ville-k the segfault might have been from an older version of Xcode, I upgraded to 7.2 trying to track down the other issue and I think it's been fixed... but it should use DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH on osx rather than LD_LIBRARY_PATH right?
body: @ville-k the segfault might have been from an older version of Xcode, I upgraded to 7.2 trying to track down the other issue and I think it's been fixed... but it should use `DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH` on osx rather than `LD_LIBRARY_PATH` right?
